description: This Python script initializes a text-based knowledge base with sample CV documents, sets up a vector database using LanceDB, and performs a filtered query through an agent to retrieve specific user information.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing the LanceDB vector database used for storing and querying document vectors.

classes.name: TextKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for managing a collection of text documents with associated metadata, supporting loading and filtering.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class that facilitates querying the knowledge base with filters and generating responses.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Function to download sample data files for knowledge filtering tests.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Method to load documents into the vector database, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: aprtint_response
methods.description: Method to generate a response based on a query with optional knowledge filters and markdown formatting.
